violationsByInspectionidList.name: Mumford High School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Mumford High School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Exhaust ventilation hood systems in FOOD preparation and WAREWASHING areas including components such as hoods, fans, guards, and ducting shall be designed to prevent grease or condensation from draining or dripping onto FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Designed to allow grease or condensation from draining/dripping onto

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Mumford High School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A)     POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOOD that is cooked, cooled, and reheated  for hot holding shall be reheated so that all parts of the FOOD reach a temperature of at least 165째F for 15 seconds, if  reheated in a microwave oven the FOOD must be rotated or stirred, covered, and allowed to stand covered for 2 minutes after reheating. (P)
(B)  Commercially processed READY-TO-EAT FOOD shall be heated to a temperature of at least 135째F for hot holding. (P)
(C) Reheating for hot holding shall be done rapidly and the may not exceed 2 hours. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Reheated to less than 165 degrees F
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Reheat to 165 degrees F for 15 seconds.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Mumford High School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
Each HANDWASHING SINK or group of adjacent HANDWASHING SINKS shall be provided with:
(A) Individual, disposable towels; (Pf)
(B) A continuous towel system that supplies the user with a clean towel;(Pf) or 
(C) A heated-air hand drying device.(Pf)
(D) A hand drying device that employs an air-knife system that delivers high velocity pressurized air at ambient temperatures.(Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Mumford High School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOOD (TIME/TEMPERATURE CONTROL FOR SAFETY FOOD)  shall be thawed:  Under refrigeration, or under cool running water (<70째 F), or as part of cooking process, and total accumulated time above 41째 F, for thawed portions, shall not exceed 4 hours.  Any thawing procedure may be used for immediate service for individual consumers order of READY-TO-EAT foods.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Use cool, running water with enough flow to remove particles.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Mumford High School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.
